title: 3 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of 2022) shall
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) 

Act 2022 (Parts 2 and 3) (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2022 (parts 2 3) (commencement) order 2022

title: 3 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of 2022) shall
heading: 2. The 26th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which Parts 2 and
text_raw:
2. The 26th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which Parts 2 and 
3 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2022 (No. 19 of 2022) shall 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 July, 2022. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [374] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
